product.name: Physicians Formula Bronze Booster Glow-Boosting BB Cream
product.description: Physicians Formula Bronze Booster Glow-Boosting BB Cream combines the best features of a BB Cream with the glowing finish of a bronzer. Weightless BB Cream formula delivers makeup + skincare performance, instantly absorbing into skin, while leaving behind a smooth, even and natural sunkissed glow.Hypoallergenic. Paraben-Free. Gluten Free. Oil Free. Fragrance Free. Non-Comedogenic. Dermatologist approved.
